attributes.action: Make The D.L.A. Application and Decision Process Fairer To People With Invisible Illnesses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fibromyalgia and Hypermobility Syndrome are amoungst many invisible illnesses that claimants of D.L.A. suffer from. They are as disabling as other conditions, but we are made to go through extrordinary steps to ensure we are 'belived' and they it does not ensure we will be awarded it.
